payload:
## Usage 

 Click on the navigation tree to open the docs

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:eslint && npm run format:prettier

{"description":"`furo-data-table`
Read only data table based on the response type from the rest api spec.


Custom property | Description | Default  | Fallback
----------------|-------------|----------|----------
`--furo-data-table-header-background` | Background color of the header row | --surface | white
`--furo-data-table-header-on-background` | Color of the header row | --on-surface | black
`--furo-data-table-background` | Background color of the element | --surface | white
`--furo-data-table-on-background` | Color of the element | --on-surface | black
`--data-table-separator` | Color of separator lines | --separator | rgba(0, 0, 0, .12)

{"description":"`furo-data-hide-content` hides content in dependency to a boolean field value. It is also possible to call the `hide()` and `show()` methods to show and hide the content and update the value. ```
some content
```","summary":"hide content","path":"src/furo-data-hide-content.js","properties":[{"name":"hidden","type":"?","description":"","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":101,"column":2},"end":{"line":103,"column":3}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"readOnly":false}}},{"name":"_hidden","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"Internal variable to update the attribute, which triggers the css","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":39,"column":6},"end":{"line":43,"column":7}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}},{"name":"hideOnFalse","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"Hide element on false instead of true","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":47,"column":6},"end":{"line":50,"column":7}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}}],"methods":[{"name":"bindData","description":"Bind a entity field to the date-input. {"description":"`furo-data-context-menu`
 A  [material design](https://material.io/components/menus/) context menu or menu element.

 You have to put a `furo-data-context-menu-display` element in one of the parent elements of the element where you use the `furo-data-context-menu`.
 The app-shell is a good place for that.

```html
 <furo-data-context-menu condensed position="below" ƒ-trigger="--menuClkd" ƒ-bind-data="--menuObject" @-menu-item-selected="--menuItem">
     <furo-icon-button icon="menu" @-click="--menuClkd"></furo-icon-button>
 </furo-data-context-menu>
```","summary":"a context menu","path":"src/furo-data-context-menu.js","properties":[{"name":"_context","type":"string | null | undefined","description":"Use this to set a string value as context.","privacy":"protected","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":35,"column":6},"end":{"line":35,"column":54}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"String"}}},{"name":"condensed","type":"boolean | null | undefined","description":"set this for condensed mode.","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":39,"column":6},"end":{"line":39,"column":34}},"metadata":{"polymer":{"attributeType":"Boolean"}}}],"methods":[{"name":"bindData","description":"Bind your menu object with the signature of menu.Menuitem or [menu.Menuitem].","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":48,"column":2},"end":{"line":55,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"menu"}],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"setContext","description":"Sets the context. Use this if you want to set a Object as context","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":61,"column":2},"end":{"line":63,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"ctx","description":"{*} Can be anything, will be returned at the menu-item-selected method"}],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"trigger","description":"Triggers the context menu. Set by keyboard to true to focus the first element for keyboard navigation","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":69,"column":2},"end":{"line":71,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"byKeyboard"}],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"triggerContext","description":"triggers the menu with context","privacy":"public","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":77,"column":2},"end":{"line":121,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[{"name":"context","description":"{Object}"},{"name":"byKeyboard"}],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"_FBPReady","description":"flow is ready lifecycle method","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":127,"column":2},"end":{"line":138,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"void"}},{"name":"render","description":"","privacy":"private","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":166,"column":2},"end":{"line":172,"column":3}},"metadata":{},"params":[],"return":{"type":"TemplateResult"}}],"staticMethods":[],"demos":[{"url":"demo-furo-data-context-menu","description":"Basic usage"}],"metadata":{},"sourceRange":{"start":{"line":25,"column":7},"end":{"line":173,"column":1}},"privacy":"public","superclass":"HTMLElement","name":"FuroDataContextMenu","attributes":[{"name":"condensed","description":"set this for condensed mode.","sourceRange":{"start":{"line":39,"column":6},"end":{"line":39,"column":34}},"metadata":{},"type":"boolean | null | undefined"}],"events":[{"type":"CustomEvent","name":"menu-item-selected","description":"menu-item-selected
Fired when a menu item is selected
detail payload:  {context, menuitem}","metadata":{}},{"type":"CustomEvent","name":"open-furo-data-menu-requested","description":"open-furo-data-menu-requested
Fired when context menu was triggered

detail payload: {context, menuitem}","metadata":{}}],"styling":{"cssVariables":[],"selectors":[]},"slots":[],"tagname":"furo-data-context-menu","mixins":["FBP"]}
